name: MMO-Sentence-Generator
tagline: Creating MMO sentences from a Neo-Davidsonian semantic representation.
body:
### Welcome to the MMO-Sentence-Generator!
![Programmer LFG!](https://raw.github.com/christophertfoo/MMO-Sentence-Generator/gh-pages/images/MMO-Ex.png)
The MMO-Sentence-Generator is a Java command line application that translates common sentences from massively multiplayer online games (MMOs or MMOGs) from a Neo-Davidsonian semantic representation into an English sentence.  Currently, the application can only process a handful of sentence types, but the system can be extended to accommodate even more kinds of sentences.

### More Information
Please see the [wiki pages](https://github.com/christophertfoo/MMO-Sentence-Generator/wiki).

### Contact Us!
See the [Contact Details](https://github.com/christophertfoo/MMO-Sentence-Generator/wiki/Contact-Details) page for information on how to get in touch with the developers!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
